name: Game A Month 2
description:
Hey! Welcome to my Game A Month 2 page. For this month I'm developing a stealth game with systemic systems. I'm currently on Version 1.0 which is the prototype. 

Expect bugs and unpolished systems!

Controls

Movement - W,A,S,D

Attack - Left Mouse Button

Crouch - C

Pick Up Object - E

Drop Object - E

Throw Object - Left Mouse Button

Music by SoundZEW

Character Art by Raymond Cripps
